description.zh-cn: 中国雷达与电子对抗技术专家，中国工程院院士，现任空军装备研究院雷达与电子对抗研究所所长、高级工程师，拥有中国人民解放军大校军衔，享受政府特殊津贴。
description.en: A Chinese expert in radar and electronic countermeasures technology, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, currently serving as the director and senior engineer of the Radar and Electronic Countermeasures Research Institute of the Air Force Equipment Research Institute. He holds the military rank of senior colonel in the People's Liberation Army and enjoys special government allowances.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省
location.en: Hunan Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市的军事院校，是中国人民解放军唯一的一所“985工程”和“211工程”重点建设的综合性大学。
description.en: A military academy located in Changsha, Hunan, China. It is the only comprehensive university under Project 985 and Project 211 directly administered by the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，是中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属的全国重点大学。
description.en: A public university located in Beijing, China, and a national key university directly under the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工程科学技术界的最高荣誉性、咨询性学术机构。
description.en: The highest honorary and advisory academic institution in the field of engineering and technological sciences in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的装备科研机构。
description.en: The equipment research institution of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

nodes.id: 雷达与电子对抗研究所

zh-cn: 雷达与电子对抗研究所

description.zh-cn: 隶属于空军装备研究院的研究所。
description.en: A research institute subordinate to the Air Force Equipment Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军衔制度中的一级军衔，位于少将之下，上校之上。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, ranking below Major General and above Colonel.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府对于高层次专业技术人才和高技能人才的一种奖励制度。
description.en: A reward system of the People's Republic of China for high-level professional and technical talents and highly skilled talents.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人大代表

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人大代表

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表，是最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: Deputies to the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, who are members of the highest organ of state power.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘永坚是湖南冷水江人。
description.en: Liu Yongjian is a native of Lengshuijiang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 1982年毕业于国防科技大学航天工程系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Aerospace Engineering at the National University of Defense Technology in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 2008年博士毕业于北京航空航天大学自动化科学与电气工程学院导航、制导与控制专业。
description.en: Graduated with a PhD in Navigation, Guidance and Control from the School of Automation Science and Electrical Engineering at Beihang University in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 2017年当选为中国工程院院士。
description.en: Elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering in 2017.

relationships.target: 雷达与电子对抗研究所

description.zh-cn: 担任空军装备研究院雷达与电子对抗研究所所长、高级工程师。
description.en: Serves as the director and senior engineer of the Radar and Electronic Countermeasures Research Institute of the Air Force Equipment Research Institute.

relationships.source: 雷达与电子对抗研究所

description.zh-cn: 雷达与电子对抗研究所是空军装备研究院下属的研究所。
description.en: The Radar and Electronic Countermeasures Research Institute is a subordinate institute of the Air Force Equipment Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 拥有大校军衔。
description.en: Holds the military rank of Senior Colonel.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人大代表

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日当选为第十三届全国人大代表。
description.en: Elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress on February 24, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 刘永坚是政府特殊津贴享受者。
description.en: Liu Yongjian is a recipient of the special government allowance.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，刘永坚是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page categories, Liu Yongjian is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.
